title: Json does not support big numbers
body:
by **roberto.catini**: 
Currently the standard library provides a type for integers bigger than int64 as Ints in
the big package.
But when encoded they are empty JSON object: http://play.golang.org/p/f3cdVCNd_O

If MarshalJSON() ([]byte, error) was implemented for a big.Int, it would be easy to
encode these kind of ints.
